author: Adam Falk
title: A Brief History of the Winter Olympics: Faster, Higher & More Extreme
text:
0 COMMENTS Since their earliest days, the Winter Olympics have pushed the extreme. But “extreme” has taken on new meaning.
In recent years, X-Games-style events are stretching the limits and shaping a riskier era for the Olympic games, with death-defying sports claiming prime-time TV spots in Olympic coverage.
Watch the video above for a look at the evolution of extreme sports at the Winter Olympics over the past century.
